endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of all scheduled events.
Create a new event with details such as title, date, and description.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific event using its unique ID.
Update information regarding a specific event.
Remove a specific event from the schedule.
Retrieve a list of all attendees registered for a specific event.
Allow a new attendee to register for an event.
Remove an attendee from the registration list using their unique ID.
Send notifications or updates to all attendees of a specific event.
Retrieve attendance and participation statistics for a specified period.
